ing.item: The Spice Hunter Cajun Creole Seasoning*

directions.step:
1. Heat grill.
2. Lightly mix beef, cajun spice and salt in large bowl. Pat into six 3 1/2x1/2-inch-thick burger patties,
3. Grill burgers 4 minutes per side for medium and rolls 1 to 2 minutes until lightly toasted. Arrange burgers on bottoms of rolls, top each with a tomato slice, cover with roll tops.
* Available in specialty stores and supermarkets or from The Spice Hunter, Inc., 800-444-3061.
Prep time: 8 minutes Grilling time: 10 minutes
